titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve grants awarded by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for comprehensive service programs to serve homeless veterans.
HOMES for our Veterans Act of 2021
HOMES for our Veterans Act of 2021
Housing Opportunities to Mitigate Expenses for Services for our Veterans Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary:
Housing Opportunities to Mitigate Expenses for Services for our Veterans Act of 2021 or the HOMES for our Veterans Act of 2021
This bill removes certain funding limitations on grants that assist eligible entities in establishing or modifying programs to furnish outreach, rehabilitative services, vocational counseling and training, and transitional housing assistance to homeless veterans.
